Event.Description: Construction, construction on Queens Midtown Tunnel westbound Manhattan Side (Manhattan) MANHATTAN EXIT PLAZA CLOSURE OF "DOWNTOWN" LANES FOR THREE MONTHS For approximately three months, the two right "Downtown" exit lanes at the Manhattan plaza of the Queens Midtown Tunnel will be closed for the final stage of exit plaza roadway rehabilitation. Customers traveling Downtown can use the four open and newly resurfaced "Uptown" or "Crosstown" exit lanes, or the left "Downtown" exit lane, which will remain open during this period. In addition, East 37th Street between Tunnel Exit and 2nd Avenue has been temporarily converted to receive two-way traffic, to accommodate motorists exiting the tunnel from the Uptown lanes and seeking a Downtown route via 2nd Avenue.

Event.Description: Construction, culvert repairs on NY 54A both directions CR 76 Bully Hill (Urbana) to Town of Pulteney; Town of Urbana Line (Pulteney) until 11:59 P.M. NY 54A, one half mile starting at CR 76 northward, Village of Hammondsport and Town of Urbana-Construction to restore embankment in two places and to repair a culvert. This project includes three locations within a distance of approximately 0.25 miles just north of the village. A full closure of NY 54A with a detour using county route 76 takes effect May 1. The highway will be reopened to traffic for the Memorial Day weekend, and be re-closed until completion of work. All properties residential and commercial , will be accessible during the work. Project completion is expected by the end of June.

This project includes three locations within a distance of approximately 0.25 miles just north of the village. A full closure of NY 54A with a detour using county route 76 takes effect May 1. The highway will be reopened to traffic for the Memorial Day weekend, and be re-closed until completion of work. All properties residential and commercial , will be accessible during the work. Project completion is expected by the end of June.

NY 54A, one half mile starting at CR 76 northward, Village of Hammondsport and Town of Urbana-Construction to restore embankment in two places and to repair a culvert. This project includes three locations within a distance of approximately 0.25 miles just north of the village. A full closure of NY 54A with a detour using county route 76 takes effect May 1. The highway will be reopened to traffic for the Memorial Day weekend, and be re-closed until completion of work. All properties residential and commercial , will be accessible during the work.
